title: Strengthening Management Strategy Competencies: Workshop for Enhancing Digital Pedagogical Competencies in Apparel Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners create one lesson design plan explicitly connecting Technological (TK), Pedagogical (PK), and Content Knowledge (CK) elements using the TPACK framework during digital technology-integrated lesson design over four weeks. The plan achieves ≥80% suitability scores in peer/expert reviews.
Acquisition of skills to operate smartphone-based digital clothing pattern design and virtual simulation tools
Establishment of a framework for analyzing digital teaching method effectiveness through mixed research methods (survey-interview)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
